column42: For ATAC-seq, the PCR duplicated alignments were marked using Picard (v2.21.4). Further quality filtering was performed using SAMtools (v1.9) to remove unmapped reads, unmapped mates, PCR duplicated reads, unpaired alignments, and reads mapped to mitochondrial DNA. The broad peak regions were called using MACS2 v2.2.5 with parameters

column12: Lung cancer cell lines were treated with 100 nM decitabine (DAC) for 72 hours followed by growing in drug-free medium for three days
column13: Lung cancer cell lines were cultured in RPMI-1640 medium with 10% FBS and 1% antibiotics.
column15: For mRNA-seq analysis, total RNA were extracted from lung cancer cell lines using Trizol reagent and Invitrogen PureLink RNA Mini Kit according to the manufacturer's procedures. For ATAC-seq analysis, DNA sample preparation was performed as described in Corces et al., 2017., mRNA-seq and ATAC-seq libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocol and Omni-ATAC protocol as described previously (Corces et al., 2017), respectively.
column16: Illumina Casava1.7 software used for basecalling., Adaptor and low-quality sequences were trimmed from sequenced reads. For mRNA-seq, the processed reads were mapped to hg19 genome reference using TopHat v2.1.1 with parameters -very-sensitive --segment-length 30 --segment-mismatches 2. For ATAC-seq, the the processed reads were also aligned to hg19 genome reference using BWA mem (v0.7.17-r1188) with default -M parameter and a maximum fragment length of 2,000., For mRNA-seq, mapped reads were counted for each gene using the R packages GenomicFeatures (v1.36.4) and GenomicAlignments (v1.20.1), according to the GENCODE human GRCh37 annotation. FPKM normalization of the raw-counts and differentially expressed genes analysis were performed using DESeq2 (v1.24.0).
column42: --nomodel --shift -75 --extsize 150 --keep-dup all --broad --broad-cutoff 0.1. Annotation of the peaks was reported using ChIPseeker v1.20.0.
column44: Tab-delimited text files including DESeq2-analyzed mRNA-seq data and MACS2-called broad peaks with ChIPseeker-annotation of ATAC-seq data.
